mapper.update: UPDATE member SET subscribe = 'Y', sub_date = date_format(NOW(), '%Y년%m월%d일%h시'), end_sub_date = date_format(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y년%m월%d일%h시') WHERE phone = #{phone}
